SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.title: Growth mindset
SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.content: I am always looking to innovate and grow as a person and professional

SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.title: Never stop learning
SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.content: I believe that learning is for life. I love learning from everyone about everything

SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.title: Quick adaptation to change
SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.content: Change is a good opportunity to see things in perspective and even change your approach

SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.title: Curious and creative
SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.content: I like even break something to learn how does it work (don't worry, always in a separated branch)
